website_summaries.verdict: Both a great deal and a solidly made bird cage, this model provides your larger bird with the space they need, and many valuable built-in conveniences.
pros: Includes feeding bowls and removable rooftop play area

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Unfinished, sharp edges. I cut myself putting it together. Imagine your poor parrot’s tender feet and potential of bleeding out. Crock holders/ doors open in (makes no sense at all. Very disappointed with purchase. Not worth taking apart, repackaging and sending back. Left at trash area. The play gym is not bad. I kept that part. Be warned. Spend the extra money for quality.
customer_reviews.author: chris miko

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its not as easy to assemble bc u can easily confuse the nails for different parts or the way certain parts go without following the instructions. But if you follow the instructions and the information on each piece then it should be easier. The cage has held up well. The bird loves it even when he is free to be anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cage great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We purchased this cage for our new Conure and the build quality was great. My 12yo son put this cage together by himself in a out 30 minutes without issue. We couldn't be more happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's way smaller than the pictures portray. Not worth the high price.
customer_reviews.text: This cage appears to be bigger in the posted pictures than it actually is. It says it's 72" and accommodates African Greys and Macaws. I had a 68" cage and was VERY disappointed to see how small this was once it was assembled. This is WAY TOO SMALL for an African Grey. It's flimsy on the carpet. My bird won't go in it. Unless you have a small bird, don't waste your money. I'm incredibly disappointed. The bowls were also dented.
customer_reviews.author: BoniJean Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little time to put together but it’s great brand, quality and works great for our bird. The side doors open for easy exchange of water and food. The top stand is great for the bird to just chill outside of cage.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Green

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, even with the instructions. The only things that didn't fit was part B (the j shaped thing). I bought two cages and both part Bs had metal end that had some of the metal sticking out which made impossible to put in.
customer_reviews.author: Lela Gitchel

customer_reviews.title: Great cage / great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My green cheek Conure is digging it. It had a small part missing - vendor shipped it out express. Having cage on wheels is turning out to be an amazing convenience. It didn’t seem that big at first but it’s big enough. assembly was relatively easy - but it’s a substantial product / have patience.
customer_reviews.author: Five-O

customer_reviews.title: Too small for anything bigger than a cockatiel
customer_reviews.text: Overall a well made bird cage... FOR A SMALL BIRD. This cage is misleading in pictures. Please do not purchase for anything bigger than a cockatiel. It is well made and sturdy. Need a couple of tools to put together (pliers) mainly. The picture of this cage containing a macaw is very misleading. Please measure it out and get a visual. I have two cages that I’m selling because they are too small for my birds. It’s true, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Jo Hempstead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bird Cage in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. Very sturdy. I absolutely love that it comes with a removable play area on top. When my boyfriend and I are in a different room, we bring that play area with us so that our cockatiel can chill on it, have food and water available and hang out with us. It also has a removable tray for easy clean up. The food and water bowls are just the right size. The locks are sturdy. Love the seed catcher around the cage. Overall, an amazing cage. I will be buying the same model for my second bird.
customer_reviews.author: DruidWolf

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Instructions provided were terrible. Thankfully Amazon had some on the site. Was much smaller than expected. Good for one Conure I would not buy it for a larger bird.
customer_reviews.author: A. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: The actual cage part is a lot smaller than I anticipated. Some pieces were bent which made assembly much harder. This is low to the floor so if you're looking for something that's higher off the ground, this may not be the item you'd want to purchase. The instructions are pictures with little to no explanation of how to assemble. No this is not intended for a bad review, but more of an informative one. Good luck on finding your perfect aviary setting. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: ~ S ~

customer_reviews.title: A huge mess because of bad design
customer_reviews.text: This cage is not designed correctly. The seeds and bedding get out and there is a constant mess around the cage. There is too big of a gap where the bedding trays go. I am so dissatisfied and need to buy another cage. I would not recommend. If this were fixed the cage would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy well made durable for the tougher bar chewers
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to say but this cage is wonderful Very sturdy and durable (Sennie proofed) 😄 Loves to sit ontop and play or eat She loves this cage and so do I 💚💛
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good when it comes together.
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a few dings. Paint was already ripping off and one of the pieces was bent (images attached). I was able to fix the bent piece and use it. I have only had it for a day but my bird seems to love it. It is sturdy but it hasn’t really been tested.
customer_reviews.author: Nasir

customer_reviews.title: great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice well built cage at a bargain price. No complaints about the cage at all. Very sturdy and good looking. The directions could be written better.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, easy to assemble. Happy Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage! Plenty of space and very easy to assemble. I got it for 139.99, for that price is above any other option.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: It’s look great, it’s took me a while to put put it together, but loved it👍
customer_reviews.text: I loved the bird cage for price, it’s reasonable. It is a little confuse when putting together. It’s perfect for my kids cockatiel. We’re very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built trays Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cockateil so my son can have his first pet cockateil. Instructions poor to read. Upon inspection while putting together found cracks on edge of trays. Tried to contact customer service and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I like the cage. It is however, ALOT smaller than I anticipated. I waited a while for the item to ship to me. It didn’t ship for an entire 8 days after I bought it. I need to do more research because I need one a bit larger for my bird. This will work until I can find one because the play top allows him to be out most of the time. Overall it’s a good cage.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cee

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for Amazon parrot.
customer_reviews.text: A little small or cramped inside for my full size blue front Amazon parrot. Cage legs (3 out of 4) came in slightly bent from shipping damage. Had several left over screws when cage was completed. Cage seemed smaller than pictured in ad. Other than that, not bad-for the money. Probably would-not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bird cage
customer_reviews.text: This bird cage is better than I expected! Great quality, lots of space and the supplies are great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Freya U. Van Housen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and not a very good quality compared to my previous purchases of similar cages.
customer_reviews.author: gift card

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller birds
customer_reviews.text: Easy to move and cleaning is much easier. I have a smaller one of the cockatoos and he did chew up all his perches so keep that in mind so I just bought new ones. Is a little tight for him but he is out of cage 90% of the time so it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Good cage just needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The play top bar doesn’t fit.... Tried to call around and no one sells the right part.... Other than that it’s a nice cage for the price
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Happy Parrot ! Great value and easy to assemble !
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage quality but not as sturdy as old one (17 years use). Modified the play top to be a platform and stand for perch. My parrot is very happy with his new cage.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B. Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting this to be so sturdy. Our daughter loves it. My husband and I put it together Christmas Eve night very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E.

customer_reviews.title: This cage is awesome, but
customer_reviews.text: Love the cage, only complaint is the assembly instructions had very little detail, pics only, nothing labeled, bottom panel hard, difiently need 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: DARLA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Cracked pan and 1 wheel keeps falling out. There are 3 doors for food dish bracket but it only comes with 2 food dish brackets. There are better cages for same price.
customer_reviews.author: Peter St.  Louis

customer_reviews.title: Alright For The Price But...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are difficult to understand and not very clear. I’m actually returning this because it’s missing the lock pieces for each door.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gianuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Good product but came with damage
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged one leg was bent outwards and missing screw in piece for the rollers. Also the guards didn’t line up with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Zaira

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for its price!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage however the assembly was somewhat difficult, my bird loves it
customer_reviews.author: Mignon

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were hard to read but we figured it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not seem to be as tall as the picture. But it is still a sturdy cage.
customer_reviews.text: It was a good case, it came on time and it was quick to assemble. It took a bit longer, but overall was not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Nell_A

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The cage is up but the instructions were horrible to follow. My cage was missing holes in places screws needed to go into or the holes weren’t lining up making my cage very unstable perches do not fit and stay properly the one at the stop was put on upstairs down so my bird has no where to stand while eating and after spending hours trying to build it and ruining the box it came in to get it all out there’s really no way for me to return it and go thru the hassle all over so I’m stuck with it. Definitely don’t recommend buying it spend a few more bucks and get you a better cage.
customer_reviews.author: Kashmir

customer_reviews.title: Home sweet home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cage for my birds cause they needed something bigger. The cage is beautiful my birds didn’t seem to care for it cause they were so use to their old beat up one but it’s so easy to clean which is a plus, it’s beautiful and easy to move around when cleaning. The price was alittle night for considering the size the picture they have doesn’t do the small one Justice considering I thought I got the big one but over all it’s a beautiful cage and my birds grew to love it
customer_reviews.author: Daniella L.

customer_reviews.title: Birds seem to like it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good beginners cage for our parakeets. It comes with water and food bowls which was nice it was less I had to buy on the lost list of supplies. It does seem kind of small ones you get toys and the perch's in it. Down the road I am sure we will upgrade to something bigger. But overall it seems well built. Not sure what some are the complaints are it went together in around 30 minutes with beer breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Addict

customer_reviews.title: Misleading on size
customer_reviews.text: They report the cage as being 25in wide. It was 18in. They mean with the seed guard around the bottom. This is NOT NOT NOT a parrot cage. It might be OK for parakeets but anything larger (cockatiels or parrots) cannot live in this.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...
customer_reviews.text: The package came tear up, some pieces were missing and the two plastics inside were broken! The instructions are not really clear in how to built the cage, it’s really sad.
customer_reviews.author: Víctor M. Henríquez

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My Bird has One Leg and she has learned to maneuver around this cage. Absolutely love the trays. Easy to clean and Keep sanitary
customer_reviews.author: Nekosmom

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Missing Hardware for water and food access. Contacted seller and have not received a response. Overall cage is acceptable. Instructions were difficult to decipher since the print was low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debara-Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, missing pieces??
customer_reviews.text: I cant put the wheels on it because im missing pieces, the legs were bent when I initially opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

product_meta.title: VIVOHOME 72 Inch Wrought Iron Large Bird Cage with Play Top and Rolling Stand for Parrots Conures Lovebird Cockatiel Parakeets
feature_bullets: STURDY CONSTRUCTION - This birdcage is constructed of premium welded steel with a sleek black hammertone metallic finish that is stylish and spacious. Solid structure and quality craftsmanship ensure that it won’t easily deform from harsh weather or bird bites

CONSIDERATE DESIGN - The heavy-duty sliding window latch keeps your bird securely inside its cage and not easy pecked open by bird. Four 360° rotating swivel casters allow for easy mobility and the bottom mesh grille helps you store bird food, toys or bird care products

SLIDE-OUT TRAYS - The top and bottom of the cage feature pull-out trays made of PPC material that is durable and resists corrosion from waste. Both trays and the bottom grill are removable and are easy-to-clean, while four panels catch any food dropped by messy birds

COMPLETE KIT - Comes with 4 removable stainless-steel bowls for feeding and 3 solid wood perches for birds to stand and rest. Also features a detachable ladder play area and an extra hook on top for hanging food, home décor, or toys to play with your birds

IDEAL USE - Cage measures 25.8” (L) x 25.8” (W) x 74.8” (H). Wire spacing is 1/2”. This cage is a great home for your feathered friends and is suitable for multiple bird species: African Grey Parrots, Macaws, Parakeets, Cockatoos, Green-Cheek Conures, and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
